  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogoutAware, Authorizer, PermissionResolverAware, RolePermissionResolverAware, CacheManagerAware, Realm, Initializable, Nameable
    Deprecated. 
    Renamed to DefaultLdapRealm, this class will be removed prior to 2.0

extends DefaultLdapRealm
    This class has been replaced with DefaultLdapRealm.
    Since:
    1.1
